column5: Well I am off tomorrow I am going Camping in Ontario 4 days off Camping and well fishing and fishing and maybe eating, some sleeping ,and then more fishing.  We are off to Long-Sault Parkway campground in Ontario.You know that place where MJL gave that fabulous Carp report with his Dad.I was going to try my Luck at Carp but I won't bother since JPD our team mate on team #4 just caught us a 38 inch carp .Check it out in the Tourny section what a monster.I don't think I can top that one.  I am Limited to my canoe this weekend so hopefully I will have something to report and I will try very hard not to flip the canoe as I just replaced my camera that was toast when I flipped the 12 ft tinny.  We will be 12 couples with kids should be a grand time.My brother in law is itching to fish, also my 16 year old nephew and I have 2 new kids to introduce to fishing.Pan fish here we come.  Have a great and safe Long weekend everyone.  MTP
Have fun! Looking forward to your report when you get back
Good luck with your trip MTP. Hope you have as much fun that I certainly had.  It's always worth a few casts for those St. Lawrence carp.
good luck and have a good trip
You're planning your weekend around the OFC derby???  Wow...

Sounds like a blast! Cant wait to see the report! 12 Couples!!! holy crap!!.. I assume we can expect 1 or 2 newborn reports in about 9 months?? we all know what happens when couples go campin' LOL  Have a blast mike!  Gerritt.

Dan my teamate I have a bigger pike to catch and I am still seeking my first Muskie that team #4 must add.I will have my OFC sign on board.I always have my team in mind.  Time to catch me a big fish in a little canoe  MTP
Have a great trip look forward to the report
you better fish for carp when you are there, it would be like going to vegas and not playing a few rounds of black jack
Good luck this weekend.  The area offers some great fishing.  The bridges have produced fish for years so don't be afraid to try from shore too.

You're going to Longsault and you're NOT fishing for Carp!???  I don't think there are any other fishing opportunities around there that can compare to the World Class carp fishing...you may want to reconsider  Tony
Well I am outta here.Be safe everyone and have a great labour day weekend.  Mike the Pike
